system.description:
Undead are once-living creatures animated by spiritual or supernatural forces.

Features: 12-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to Â½ total Hit Dice (as wizard); good Will saves. Many undead are mindless and gain no skill points or feats.

Traits: Undead do not breathe, eat, or sleep; no Constitution score; not affected by raise dead or reincarnate (resurrection and true resurrection can restore to life); not at risk of death from massive damage but destroyed at 0 hp; immunity to Fortitude effects (unless harmless or affecting objects), poison, sleep, paralysis, stunning, disease, death effects, and mind-affecting effects; not subject to critical hits, nonlethal damage, ability drain, or energy drain; uses Charisma for Concentration; negative energy heals undead; darkvision 60 ft.
